VRDisplayDepthFar.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The depthFar property of the interface gets and sets the z-depth defining the far plane of the eye view frustum, i.e. the furthest viewable boundary of the scene.

blockquote.para: Note: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para: Generally you should leave the value as is, but you might want to reduce it if you are trying to improve performance on slower computers.

-WebVR API homepage
- â€” demos, downloads, and other resources from the Mozilla VR team.

VRDisplayDepthFar.value:
A double, representing the z-depth in meters.
It initial value is 10000.0.
